data.title: Time Zone & Clock Changes in Santa Margherita di Pula, Italy
data.meta_description: Historic, present and future dates for daylight saving time and clock changes. Time changes between years 2023 and 2027 in Italy – Santa Margherita di Pula are shown here.

The graph above illustrates clock changes in Santa Margherita di Pula during 2024.

Time Changes in Santa Margherita di Pula Over the Years

Daylight Saving Time (DST) changes do not necessarily occur on the same date every year.

Time zone changes for:

YearDate & TimeAbbreviationTime ChangeOffset After2023So, 26. Mär, 02:00CET → CEST+1 hour (DST start)UTC+2hSo, 29. Okt, 03:00CEST → CET-1 hour (DST end)UTC+1h2024So, 31. Okt, 03:00CEST → CET-1 hour (DST end)UTC+1h2026So, 29. Mär, 02:00CET → CEST+1 hour (DST start)UTC+2hSo, 25. Okt, 03:00CEST → CET-1 hour (DST end)UTC+1h2027So, 28. Mär, 02:00CET → CEST+1 hour (DST start)UTC+2hSo, 31. Okt, 03:00CEST → CET-1 hour (DST end)UTC+1h

* All times are local Santa Margherita di Pula time. Next time change is highlighted.

Data for the years before 1970 is not available for Santa Margherita di Pula, however, we have earlier time zone history for Rome available.
